MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD8 postcode area of Jedburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00pm to make a repair to overhead line equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:08pm on 5th December 2020.
